title: LoL client trojan?
body:
Hi,
for the last two days every time I open the client to play a game Windows defender pops-up saying that a severe threat was found which affects vgrl.dll and I must take action against it.

Any thoughts on that?

Thank you!

replies.body: I believe the team which owns vgrl.dll is aware of this and they may have already fixed it (if not they will soon)!
Have you tried sending a ticket? Or they simply ignored you? (Happened to me once, took em like a day to answer..)

They didn't ignore you, I'm sure. I don't know what the size of their player support team is, particularly those that can handle technical issues, but I know that it is a much smaller number than the amount of people who play League, even if you narrow that down to the number facing technical issues and the number who actually contact support.

Same for me. the file is blocked, and this makes the client force into repair. 

Here's the virus total for this vrgl.dll file.

https://www.virustotal.com/gui/file/b674212f968aeffce98867b77eda6b2905eac4c140119cc038223ca45536b366/detection

Riot, can we have some help here?
